settings.title: Who are we?
settings.text: ActivePosture® is the official European distributor of posture corrective clothing from AlignMed, the company behind the patented and medically registered Posture Shirt™. ActivePosture® has been in business since 2014, when the married couple Mia and Kenneth shipped the very first Posture Shirt™ from their home. Since then, more than 300,000 products have been shipped from our warehouse and the assortment has expanded to include a wide range of products that improve posture, help relieve pain and increase daily well-being.
